metadata.title: Azure Data Fundamentals DP-900 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Describe Core Data Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Batch vs Streaming is a key concept in Describe Core Data Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure Data Fundamentals exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with identify options for data storage. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any describe core data concepts task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Describe Core Data Concepts is most closely related to describe common data workloads?
options: Describe Core Data Concepts governance and oversight
Describe Core Data Concepts implementation and operations
Describe Core Data Concepts assessment and testing
Describe Core Data Concepts risk management
questions.explanation: Describe common data workloads falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Describe Core Data Concepts.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Describe Core Data Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Data Lake is a key concept in Describe Core Data Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure Data Fundamentals exam.
